meanings.definition: A tall, multi-layered sandwich typically containing a variety of meats, cheeses, and condiments.
meanings.sent1: I ordered a delicious dagwood for lunch at the deli.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's specialty is their famous dagwood sandwich.
meanings.sent3: When I bit into the dagwood, all the flavors exploded in my mouth!
meanings.sent4: The dagwood towered on the plate like a culinary skyscraper.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly made dagwood made my stomach growl.

meanings.definition: A type of comic strip character known for his large appetite and love of sandwiches.
meanings.sent1: My favorite comic character is Dagwood because he always makes me laugh.
meanings.sent2: Dagwood's antics in the comic strip never fail to entertain me.
meanings.sent3: Dagwood's love for sandwiches is both hilarious and relatable.
meanings.sent4: In the comic world, Dagwood's appetite is as legendary as his name.
meanings.sent5: Dagwood's big heart matches his big appetite in the comic series.
